lead_paragraph: The police in Israel said the 13-year-old girl was shot by a civilian guard outside a West Bank settlement after running at him with a knife.

headline.print_headline: Palestinian Girl, 13, Is Shot Dead by Israeli Guard
headline.main: Palestinian Girl With Knife Killed by Israeli Guard, Police Say

snippet: The police in Israel said the 13-year-old girl was shot by a civilian guard outside a West Bank settlement after running at him with a knife.
abstract: Israeli security guard fatally shoots 13-year-old Palestinian girl Ruqayya Eid Abu Eid near West Bank settlement of Anatot.
